titles.title: Pisgah National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2009
Pisgah National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2009
Pisgah National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2009
To adjust the boundaries of Pisgah National Forest in McDowell County, North Carolina.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry Discharged.
Reported by the Committee on Agriculture. H. Rept. 111-251.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 139.

action.text: Mr. Holden moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1002.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 9/15/2009--Passed House without amendment. Pisgah National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act of 2009 - Modifies the boundaries of the Pisgah National Forest in McDowell County, North Carolina, to provide for the inclusion of certain private land and Forest Service land in the Forest. Requires an owner's consent to acquire the private land.
